sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"vim"}}>{`Vim`}</MDXTag>
{/* TOC */}
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#vim"}}>{`Vim`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#vim-packages-and-creating-files"}}>{`Vim Packages and creating files`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#vim-modes-navigation-and-commands"}}>{`Vim modes, navigation and commands`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#executing-external-commands"}}>{`Executing external commands`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#files-and-buffers"}}>{`Files and buffers`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
{/* /TOC */}
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"vim-packages-and-creating-files"}}>{`Vim Packages and creating files`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Installing Vim `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`yum install vim`}</MDXTag>{` of `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`apt-get install vim`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`vim -g`}</MDXTag>{` can actually run the GUI - who cares though. There are a number of different GUI wrappers. `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`gvim`}</MDXTag>{` is the most popular.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`So we have `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`vi`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`vim`}</MDXTag>{` - the improved vi and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`gvim`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"vim-modes-navigation-and-commands"}}>{`Vim modes, navigation and commands`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Command/Normal mode`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Insert/Ex mode`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Mark mode`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Key`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`What it does`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`x`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Delete character`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`:q!`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Quit and omit changes`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`:wq`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Write and quit`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`"File mode"`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`h`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Left`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`j`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Down`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`k`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Up`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`l`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Right`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`w`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Word forward`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`e`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Word forward last char`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`b`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Back word`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`0`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Go to start`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`\$`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Go to end`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`v`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Highlight words`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`%`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Go to matching bracket/quotes etc`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Number, command`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Move by certain amount`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`r`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Replace`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`u`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Undo`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Redo`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`d (twice)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Delete the line`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`d, w`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Delete the word`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Number, i`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Insert a number of times`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Number, r`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Replace a number of chars`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Number, x`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Delete certain number of keys`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`y, move to new spot, p`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Yank the link, then paste`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`v, then y`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Mark mode and yank`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`>>`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Indent forward`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`<<`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Indent back`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`/<word>`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Find a word`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`n/N`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Forward search, N upwards`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`?<word>`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Search bottom up (N/n swap)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`%s/ex/EX/g`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Global ex regex`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`#s/ex/EX/gc`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Confirm value swapping`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"executing-external-commands"}}>{`Executing external commands`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`These are a few of the more advanced things.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`: ! ls -al ~`}</MDXTag>{` - it will run the command, and then we get the option to run a command.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`:r ! cat /root/.bash_profile`}</MDXTag>{` for example will read in the profile.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"files-and-buffers"}}>{`Files and buffers`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`:saveas <name|path>`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
